mapper.select: select email, mod_dt, mod_user, phone_number, reg_dt, reg_user, user_account from tb_user
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (email, mod_dt, mod_user, phone_number, reg_dt, reg_user, user_account) values (#{email}, #{modDt}, #{modUser}, #{phoneNumber}, #{regDt}, #{regUser}, #{userAccount})
